definitions.definition: The quality or state of being sensitive ; sensitiveness .
The ability of an organism or organ to respond to external stimuli .

subdefinitions.definition: Vulnerability to medical treatment: Synonym of susceptibility .

definitions.definition: The probability , in a binary classification test , of a true positive being correctly identified.
The degree of response of an instrument to a change in an input signal .
The degree of response of a film etc. to light of a specified wavelength .

main_definition: The quality or state of being sensitive ; sensitiveness .
secondary_definitions: ( biology ) The ability of an organism or organ to respond to external stimuli .
( statistics ) The probability , in a binary classification test , of a true positive being correctly identified.
( electronics ) The degree of response of an instrument to a change in an input signal .
( photography ) The degree of response of a film etc. to light of a specified wavelength .
